author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
All types of nodes can provide events. You need to specify _what kind_ of events you want to listen to.
You can _usually_ not just query for all types of events.
Regardless, this is the channel for future jso-rpc-api updates not for usage advice. 
If you're using OpenEthereum, I suggest asking in their discord
